review: I love the Fire TV.  The voice remote is very nice, however it only searches for a show, it doesn't respond to play. I like that it connects to your prime membership account and everything is saved for you.  I didn't give it five stars because it only mirrors it's own products and I wish I could mirror my Apple products and I would like the voice remote to be able to respond to more commands.

review: We enjoy Amazon Fire TV, but have trouble playing regular shows that we like from my Kindle Fire to the TV.(Example:  recently broadcast Castle, Elementary episodes).  We took my Kindle to Best Buy (where we bought the fire TV),but they didn't know how to get the show that plays on my kindle fire onto our main TV.  Any suggestions?
